ygData.subject: Re: GAR for Xbox 360
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, in fact we are hoping to port GAR to Xbox.  Because GAR is written in XNA, it should be feasible.  There are some tricky issues between PC and Xbox, but

Yes, in fact we are hoping to port GAR to Xbox.  Because GAR is written i=
n XNA, it should be feasible.  There are some tricky issues between PC and =
Xbox, but we are aware of them and have plans to address them.  We do actua=
lly have a prototype that plays to some extent with an Xbox controller alre=
ady, although it can't really be played yet in this way because some of the=
 interface is not usable with the joystick.  We will first complete version=
 1.2, and then our plan is to concentrate on Xbox.

ken

--- In neat@yahoog=
roups.com, "spoonsx21" <spoonsx21@...> wrote:
>
> I was wondering if there =
was every any discussion of releasing GAR on the Xbox 360? I recently stumb=
led upon some information regarding submitting games to the XNA creator com=
munity, which (if it passed peer review) could allow it to be added to the =
Xbox marketplace. I think the controls would be well suited for an Xbox 360=
 controller (they could be a lot like Geometry wars), and it could help rea=
ch wider audiences (if that's at all desired). 
> 
> I haven't a clue how h=
ard it would be to port it to the Xbox, but was curious if you guys thought=
 about it at all?
> 
> -Paul
>
